## FaceOptions type

Options for `SimpleEntityController.face`<!-- -->.

Use for: customizing a single `face()` call (callbacks, completion). Do NOT use for: persistent defaults; use `SimpleEntityControllerOptions`<!-- -->.

\*\*Category:\*\* Controllers

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FaceOptions = {
    faceCallback?: FaceCallback;
    faceCompleteCallback?: FaceCompleteCallback;
};
```
**References:** [FaceCallback](./server.facecallback.md)<!-- -->, [FaceCompleteCallback](./server.facecompletecallback.md)
